item.title: Mage bug!
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Try this: if (s == "Varrock") { if((playerHasItemAmount(554, 1)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 3)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(563, 1)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } if (playerLevel[6] <= 24) sendMessage("You need a magic level of 25 to use this spell!"); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(554, 1)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(556, 3)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(563, 1)==true)) { teleX = 3210; teleY = 3424; deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 1); deleteItem(556, getItemSlot(556), 3); deleteItem(563, getItemSlot(563), 1); addSkillXP((70*playerLevel[6]), 6); newheightLevel = 0; } }

Read full topic

item.title: Mage bug!
item.dc:creator: @459_expert 459 expert
item.description:
@459_expert wrote:

Change if (s == "Varrock") { if (playerLevel[6] <= 25) if (playerLevel[6] >= 24) sendMessage("You need a magic level of 25 to use this spell!"); if(playerHasItemAmount(563, 1) && playerHasItemAmount(554, 1) && playerHasItemAmount(556, 3)) { teleX = 3210; teleY = 3424; deleteItem(563, getItemSlot(563), 1); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 1); deleteItem(556, getItemSlot(556), 3); addSkillXP((20*playerLevel[6]), 6); newheightLevel = 0; teleport(); } else { } }
To This

if (s == "Varrock") { if (playerLevel[6] >= 25) if(playerHasItemAmount(563, 1) && playerHasItemAmount(554, 1) && playerHasItemAmount(556, 3)) { teleX = 3210; teleY = 3424; deleteItem(563, getItemSlot(563), 1); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 1); deleteItem(556, getItemSlot(556), 3); addSkillXP((20*playerLevel[6]), 6); newheightLevel = 0; teleport(); } else { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell"); } if (playerLevel[6] <= 24) sendMessage("You need a magic level of 25 to use this spell!"); }
It should work.

Read full topic

item.title: Mage bug!
item.dc:creator: @bmxr4c3r709 bmxr4c3r709
item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

Okay… I just made it so mage requires runes and levels… but when I went to make the teleports require levels, it didn’t work, I compiled with no errors…

Here’s my code…

if (s == "Varrock") { if (playerLevel[6] <= 25) if (playerLevel[6] >= 24) sendMessage("You need a magic level of 25 to use this spell!"); if(playerHasItemAmount(563, 1) && playerHasItemAmount(554, 1) && playerHasItemAmount(556, 3)) { teleX = 3210; teleY = 3424; deleteItem(563, getItemSlot(563), 1); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 1); deleteItem(556, getItemSlot(556), 3); addSkillXP((20*playerLevel[6]), 6); newheightLevel = 0; teleport(); } else { } }

Read full topic
